tagline: Creative offensive security testing — chains low-severity findings into critical exploit paths
pros: Finds business logic flaws and chain exploits that scanners miss entirely
Full-stack offensive testing: web, API, network, cloud, social engineering
Clear attack narratives that help developers understand and fix vulnerabilities
Proof-of-concept for every finding — no theoretical hand-waving
cons: Offensive focused — doesn't implement fixes or build defenses
Needs clear scope and rules of engagement before starting
Point-in-time testing — not continuous security monitoring

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
